Hotspots.DragNDropNotes: Drag and drop an entity into the boxes below.
Hotspots.HiddenNotes: By default, the macros will fire even when the drawing is hidden to players.
Hotspots.ClickDescription: This entity will trigger when a player clicks within the bounds of the drawing.
Hotspots.EnterDescription: This entity will trigger when a player's token enters the bounds of the drawing
Hotspots.ExitDescription: This entity will trigger when a player's token leaves the bounds of the drawing
